alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 10:46PM MST until February 22 at 8:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MONDAY TO 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected, heavy at times. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 AM Monday to 8 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on icy and snowpacked roadways with areas of blowing and heavy snowfall impacting visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
